Reviews.Title: Stay the hell away from this
Reviews.Author: moul4519
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself on 12/18/2013. I got it at 12/28/2013.  Speedy delivery. That is the only good about this smart watch. It's all plastic. Very cheaply made. Does say it can us a micro sd card up to 32 gb. It could not read it.  I know it's cheap and I should of gotten a higher brand smart watches. But some times cheaper brands can surprise you. I did my home work on them. This did get a good review on you tube.When I tried to put the sad card in it. The door to it broke off. When I placed the card in it could not read the card. The SIMs card did good. I made calls.  But it was so low you needed head phones to hear. Other people on you tube sounded awesome then my did.  The radio was pretty darn good I was impressed.  I could not get music to download on it.The screen looked good and clear. Then just a few minutes of use I got the white screen. I could not see any thingNo, stars for this crap.  Do yourself a favor. Go and get a sony a pebble anything then this.

Reviews.Author: Warrior Breed "Born to do battle, drafted at ...
Reviews.Content: The ability to see the future does not require sight just Vision and the Passion the embrace Change for a better American future!-Born to do battle, drafted at birth.a.k.a.Warrior Breed!-Michael E. McKinzy, Sr.-12-21-2013

ProductInfo.Features:
1.8 inch TFT LCD touch screen watch mobile phone; Resistive touch screen and keypad for convenient operation
1 SIM card slot and works with GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz; Bluetooth for hand-free access calling and listening to music; Single camera, take 640 x 480 pixels pictures and with video capability
Supports TF card to expand storage up to 32GB (Micro SD/T-Flash card Not included) Amusing Entertainments: Music/Movie Player + Image Viewer + Sound Recorder + Camera + Java
Handy Tools: Calendar + Alarm + World Clock + Calculator + Torch
This Cell Phone only works with GSM networks(850/900/1800/1900MHz), NOT 3G Networks
ProductInfo.Name: 1.8" Resistive Touch Screen AT&T T-Mobile Vodafone Unlocked Watch Cell Phone w Bluetooth/ Camera/ JAVA/ Torch - Black
